member.name: T:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker
member.summary: The Benchmarker class is used, as its name implies, to benchmark proccesses. It is used to execute operations and analyze the time taken and the memory variation.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker, assigning a new Stopwatch to it.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker class, looping its main method for an amount of times.
member.param: Amount of times to loop. Use 0 to not execute the main method on construction.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Benchmarker, outputting data to a writer.
member.param: The writer to output data to.
Number of times to loop the main method.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker, assigning a stopwatch to it and making it benchmark for a number of times.
member.param: The stopwatch to assign to it.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Benchmarker class, assigning a stopwatch to it, while also making it execute its benchmark. Outputs the result to the writer.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch)
member.summary: Creates a benchmarker, assigning a custom stopwatch to it.

member.name: T:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report
member.summary: BenchmarkReports are generated by the Benchmarker, containing relevant data such as memory usage at the time of creation and time elapsed.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report},System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Benchmark report, using a Stopwatch and a list of reports as reference. It then adds itself to the list. It will call the GarbageCollector automatically, but the stopwatch will be halted beforehand to prevent time loss.
member.param: Stopwatch to use. It is automatically stopped.
List of reports to use as reference.
Number of iterations that were executed.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string containing this report's main data.
member.returns: A string containing this report's data.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Returns a string with this report's data using a specific formatting for the numbers.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.ToString(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.IFormatProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string with this report's data using specific formatting.
member.param: Format to use for the time.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.TimeElapsed
member.summary: Amount of time spent until the creation of this report.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.Memory
member.summary: Amount of memory used at the time.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.MemoryChange
member.summary: Amount of memory that has changed.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.PreGCMemory
member.summary: Memory usage prior to Garbage Collection.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.Iterations
member.summary: Amount of iterations that were executed.

member.name: P:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.TimePerIteration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time spent per iteration (in milliseconds).

member.name: P:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.MemoryPerIteration
member.summary: Gets the amount of memory used per iteration.

member.name: P:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.GarbageSize
member.summary: Gets the size of Garbage memory (in bytes).

member.name: P:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Report.GarbagePercent
member.summary: How many % of PreGCMemory is garbage.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Reports
member.summary: List of reports that were generated by the last benchmark.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Stopwatch
member.summary: The stopwatch that is being used by this benchmarker.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Iteration
member.summary: The benchmarker's current iteration.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.MainMethod
member.summary: This is the method that the Benchmarker is to analyze.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Benchmark(System.Int32)
member.summary: Benchmarks the main method.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker.Benchmark(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Benchmarks the benchmarker's main method, outputting its results.

member.name: T:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated
member.summary: The BenchmarkerDelegated class is similar to Benchmarker, but will call a delegate on MainMethod().

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker})
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker},System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker.
member.param: Amount of times to execute the action.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker},System.IO.TextWriter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Benchmarker, outputting data to a writer.
member.param: The action to execute in the main method.
Number of times to loop the main method.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker},System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker.
member.param: Amount of times to execute the action.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker},System.IO.TextWriter,System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker.
member.param: Amount of times to execute the action.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.#ctor(System.Action{Cephei.Benchmarking.Benchmarker},System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch)
member.summary: Creates a new benchmarker.

member.name: M:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.MainMethod
member.summary: Calls its MainAction delegate.

member.name: F:Cephei.Benchmarking.BenchmarkerDelegated.MainAction
member.summary: The MainAction that this Benchmarker is to call.
